revised_title: A New Class of Bodies Homologous to Hydrocyanic Acid: Cyanide of Phenyl
tldr: The author discovers a new class of bodies homologous to hydrocyanic acid, specifically cyanide of phenyl, which undergoes a unique transformation when acted upon by water. This new compound is isomeric with benzonitrile and has different properties, opening up new avenues for research in organic chemistry.
